name: Two unique Loose socks 2個ルーズソックスな珍しい
description:
This is my first LoRA.

Two unique Loose socks. (aka boot socks, slouch socks, hooter girl socks, baggy socks etc.)

Both trained with 26 images.

Mainly for 3D but can be used for 2D as well but prone to collapse.

Kinda difficult to use. Due to lack of experience, some poses tend to be fixed or broken.

Only in 2D, sock tends to absorb skin tone/sock color wants to be black.(idk why!)

Would like to improve it, though it's too complicated for me at now and won't happen anytime soon.

1.) BaggySocksLayer

Loose socks worn over knee-highs. Seen in the past 20 years or so in Japan.

Recommended range:

3D, 0.8-1.3

2D, 1.1-1.5

Yet knee-highs struggle to appear.

2.) BaggySocksPlain

Loose socks without elastic band(in contrast of the "Ribbed ones").

This type was seen in the mid-1990s. Extincted fast. Very rare nowadays. Often seen in manga and anime. (cause they are easy to draw?) Most known with Mikoto Misaka and her sisters of "A Certain Scientific Railgun" and Uncho Kanu from "Ikki Tousen / Battle Vixens".

Recommended range:

3D, 0.9-1.1

2D, 0.8-1.4

Btw, the TRUE "Gomu-nuki Loose socks" has almost no wrinkles compared to this LoRA. Sadly, said images are hard to come by these days.

x.)BaggySocksSuper

Been called "Super Loose socks" because of its excessive length.

Some being over 180cm(6ft) before worn, in most case taller than the wearer.

You can easily tell by its ridiculous amounts of wrinkles that covers the entire calf.

Definitely not a cheap sock.

*The outcome is not what I expected, but I'll put it up anyway.

Refrain from commercial purposes.

Thanks to Civitai and its energetic folks.
